help-file.title: SKILL_ETHERMANCER
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all the skills and spells available to the Ethermancer class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h piercing, 1h slashing, bandage, carve, clerical spell knowledge, climb, dodge, double attack, first aid, fishing, mine, quick chant, retreat, swim
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st circle: Faerie Fire, Ice Missile, Vapor Armor 2nd circle: Chill Touch, Detect Magic, Purify Spirit 3rd circle: Faerie Fog, Frost Bolt, Wind Blade 4th circle: Coldshield, Cone of Cold, Faerie Sight 5th circle: Ice Storm, Storm Empathy, Vapor Strike 6th circle: Frost Beacon, Frostbite, Lightning Curtain 7th circle: Cold Snap, Forked Lightning, Windwalk 8th circle: Ethereal Form, Ethereal Recharge 9th circle: Arcane Whirlwind, Plane Shift 10th circle: Induce Tupor, Purge 11th circle: Blur, Mass Fly, Tempest Terrain 12th circle: Path of Frost
Ethermancer Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Windtalker, Frost Magus, Cosmomancer
